entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
